name: 3-door Wardrobe
description: Client is a mother to 3 young children ages 3, 5 and 6. Family stays in a rental flat. Due to family's financial circumstances, client is unable to afford the purchase of a new wardrobe as their current wardrobe is no longer in a good condition. For further liaison on delivery address etc, kindly contact me at 98598768, thank you!

name: TV console
description: A family of 3 requires a small TV console as their current one spoiled. Client is the sole breadwinner for the family.

contact.name: Fu Xiu Ting

name: Television
description: A family of 3 requires a television as their current one spoiled. Client is the sole breadwinner for the family.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Yew Tee
contact.name: Fu Xiu Ting

name: Kitchen Cabinet (Approx L120cm x W60cm)
description:
Client is temporarily unfit for work due to multiple health issues. The family of 5 is currently supported by client’s husband who only started his new job recently and his income is unstable.

Their fridge and gas stove have been used for 10 years and are no longer functioning well. They also need to replace their existing kitchen table in view of the low height which can cause safety hazard to the young children.

name: Family-sized wardrobe
description: A family of 5 is looking for family-sized wardrobe. Client is a single mother who is unable to work as she needs to take care of her 3-year-old daughter. As client is relying on her mother's income from her ad-hoc employment, they do not have sufficient finances to replace their broken wardrobe. Hence, they would appreciate the support for a wardrobe.

name: Wardrobe
description: Client has a large family with 5 young children. The family has high living expenses, and client's husband is the sole breadwinner of the family. Husband's pay is insufficient to provide for the children's needs. Client is still unable to work at the moment as she is caring full-time for her youngest (1 years old) and they have difficulties placing her in infant care. The home's wardrobes (1 big 1 small) has spoilt i.e. doors r spoilt, cracks, peeling) and client does not have enough money at the moment to buy new wardrobes. It would be very helpful if a donor could provide her with new wardrobes, or preloved one in good working condition in time for Hari Raya (if possible). Client prefers a new one but FSC has tried to manage her expectations. Feel free to contact me for more information. I will only be able to reply on weekdays office hours. Feel free to email me. Thank you very much for helping the family!

name: Wardrobe
description:
Client is a single mother with 4 young children. She and her 7y/o daughter is diagnosed with eczema. They are also allergic to dust and dust-mites. Contact with them will often aggravate their eczema. 

Their current wardrobe is found to have dust-mites and their eczema has been flaring up significantly. Mother is also diagnosed to be unfit for work and is unable to make such purchase.

contact.name: Yu Ki

name: Wardrobe/Closet
description: Client is struggling financially and is currently unemployed due to medical reasons. She stays in a rental flat with few appliances and food. Client has no wardrobe to hang her clothes and wishes to keep them properly without hanging it out in the open.

name: Dressing table with mirror
description: Mdm N is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). She is suffering from arthritis on both her knees and has trouble with her ambulation. THKMC is looking for a dressing table with mirror to improve her home condition. If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact Qhairah Qhaliesah (Case Manager) at 9177 6614 or Qhairahqhaliesah@thkmc.org.sg Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services. THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

name: 4 door wardrobe
description:
Family of 6 with 4 school-going children will be shifted into their 3-room purchased flat from their current rental flat. As family is undergoing financial difficulties, they would require support with home items (4 door wardrobe) for their new house.
Parents have been working hard to meet the family's financial needs and support with home items that will ensure family will save up money for renovation cost. 

Donor to kindly cover transport arrangement and delivery cost please. Thank you!

name: Small Cabinet for Kitchen
description: Hi there is a family of six in need of a small kitchen cabinet. Mother has been unable to work as she needs to caregive for 4 of her young children. Father is the sole breadwinner of the household and is currently facing some financial difficulties. Their current wooden kitchen cabinet is experiencing bad wear and tear and is unable to hold items. Thank you.

name: Cupboard
description: Client is a 66 year old man living alone in a 1-room HDB rental unit. He has multiple chronic conditions, and is undergoing dialysis thrice a week. He had a bedbug infestation in his home and had to clear out the majority of his furniture. In addition, he had recently undergone an amputation of his leg and is still adjusting to life without his limb. He would like some furniture with wheels that are also wheelchair-friendly as he now has to rely on moving around his house on the wheelchair. Any kind of assistance is appreciated, thank you!

name: Double Decker Bedframe (top single,bottom queen)
description:
Client is a mother of 7 (F/16, F/10, F/9, M/8, F/6, F/4, M/1). 
Client and her husband currently live in a 1-room-1-hall with F/4 and M/1, as the other children have been removed from them by Child Protective Services, and are in foster care. 
Client has recently been diagnosed with diabetes and hypertension, and will be undergoing a gall bladder removal, pending clearance from her doctor as her hypertension is unmanaged and might pose as a medical risk.
Her husband is currently unemployed, as he has been diagnosed with pre-cardiac condition and severe psoriasis. 
As such, the family are limited in their financial resources and are unable to replace their broken bed frame. As such, the queen bed at the bottom is drooping down, causing back aches.

name: Milk
description:
Client is a young single mother of her daughter who is diagnosed with autism. Client faces financial issues and debts arising from recent unexpected transitions. Client hopes that by receiving some milk powder support (~4-6 tins), it can alleviate her stress over daughter's wellbeing a little and tide her through so that she can have increased capacity to cope.
Milk brand and stage: Friso Gold Stage 3

name: Diapers
description: Client has 6 children under her care below the ages of 13. Husband is uninvolved and not supporting the family. Client had been diagnosed with a mental health illness, and is unable to work while she undergoes treatment. She is currently struggling to meet the needs of her children.

name: Milk formula and Diapers
description:
Milk formula and Diapers

Quantity: 8 tins of Dumex Dugro 3 (1 - 3 years) and 8 packets of XXL Drypers Drypantz

Client is the primary caregiver to her 4 children, aged 11, 9, 8 and 3. The 6-member household is dependent on the sole income of client's husband with some financial support from the Social Service Office. However, the current household income is insufficient to sustain the household expenses and basic needs of the family unit given that a significant portion has to be allotted towards the 4 children with differing ages and developmental needs. Client is hence seeking for support to be rendered in sustaining the developmental needs of her 3-year-old so as to alleviate the household's financial burden and whilst financial alternatives are being explored.

The child consumes about 4 cans of milk powder, and 4 bags of diapers a month. It would be great if prospective donors could help this family in this area.

description:
Client is a mother of 4 children residing in a low-income household. Her husband is the sole breadwinner of the household and his income is insufficient to meet the family’s needs adequately. Client is unable to work currently due to her depressive episode. However, she is a resilient individual who is keen to work once she is better in order to support her family. Hence, receiving some assistance in the provision of milk and diapers would greatly alleviate their plight. 

Client would greatly appreciate receiving assistance in getting the following:
1) Lactogen 3 milk formula

3) Drypers XXL

Due to the hospital and personal arrears, they may have difficulty with their youngest children's milk and diaper expenses for March and April 2023. As such, family is hoping to obtain these items for their children: 4 boxes of Dugro Step 3, 4 tins of Nature One Premium Follow-On Stage 2, 4 packets of Mami Poko size XXL and 4 packets of Dryper tape size L. Please contact Derek at 85255280 (whatsapp) or derek@newhopecs.org.sg if you would like to buy or contribute one (with the installation). If you are able to help with the installation fees for the water heater, that will be really helpful.

name: Washing Machine
description:
Two elderly men who are currently homeless and staying in transitional shelters are moving in to their new HDB rental flat at Bedok and they need a washing machine for their house as their house currently do not have any furnitures and they are unable to afford a washing machine.

Please contact Derek at 85255280 (whatsapp) or derek@newhopecs.org.sg if you would like to donate one. Please ensure that the washing machine is still in good, clean and working condition and photos and dimensions of the washing machine will be really helpful. If you are able to provide transport for the washing machine, that will be really helpful too. Thank you!

If you are able to provide transport for the fridge, that will be really helpful too. Thank you!

name: Fridge
description: Client has depression and schizophrenia. Unfit for work. Husband is also going through depression. Couple is taking care of a 17 year old girl.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bukit Panjang
contact.name: Nur Ashikin Binte Hazlan

name: Fridge
description: Client is a single-mother to 2 children who has intellectual disability. She is also a full-time caregiver of grandson. Children are currently working and main income earner of family. Family had just moved into their new flat. However, they are facing financial difficulties in purchasing their home furniture.

name: Microwave Oven
description:
On behalf of male client who is in need of one. He is currently staying alone in a rental flat and unemployed due to health deterioration and chronic medical conditions,which made it difficult to make ends meet.

He does not have access to a microwave,which makes it difficult for him to heat up his meals. He need access to it as he relies on ration which required him to heat up the food via microwave to cook them. Having access to a microwave would greatly improve his quality of life and allow him to heat up his food . We would be extremely grateful if you could provide assistance to alleviate his current struggles and improve his living conditions significantly. In view of his financial constraint, he unable to afford the cost of delivery; will need the cost to be borne by the donor.

Thank you for generous help. Appreciate it.

name: Oven
description: Family of 3 living in rental flat requires the item for their daily usage. Family is facing financial difficulties as Mother is the main caregiver for the 2 young children and thus, is financially dependent on Social Assistance. (Donor to kindly arrange/pay for delivery pls)

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Low Zi Yuan

name: Fridge (Halal)
description: Family of 3 living in rental flat requires the item for their daily usage. Family is facing financial difficulties as Mother is the main caregiver for the 2 young children and thus, is financially dependent on Social Assistance. (Donor to kindly pay/arrange for delivery)

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Low Zi Yuan

name: Top load Washing Machine
description:
Client living alone in rental flat and has been unable to resume part-time work due to deteriorating chronic medical conditions. Client’s washing machine has broken down and due to financial constraints, he is unable to replace the top load washing machine and has been handwashing his clothes. 

Client would benefit greatly if he is able to receive a functional second-hand Top Load Washing Machine to help reduce his physical load. As client is unable to afford the delivery cost as well, he will need the cost to be borne by the donor. 

Your help would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.

name: Refrigerator
description: Family with 5 school-going children need a new fridge as their current one is spoilt. As the family have only one breadwinner and on a low income, they are unable to afford a new fridge for the family.

contact.org: MontfortCare - Marine Parade Family Service Centre
contact.name: Fatimah Hakeem

name: Washing Machine
description: Family with 5 school-going children need a washing machine as their current one is spoilt. As the family has only one main breadwinner and are a low-income family, they are unable to afford to buy a new washing machine.

contact.org: MontfortCare - Marine Parade Family Service Centre
contact.name: Fatimah Hakeem

name: Stove
description: Client is a single mother, originally from Indonesia. She has three boys and works as a packer for supermarket. Her stove has spoilt recently and she needs help to get another stove.

name: Kitchen Appliances
description:
Client is a divorcee and mother of 2 children. They have recently moved into a rental flat with limited furnishing and utilities. Client hopes she can get help to receive the following cooking appliances:
1. Air fryer
2. Electric cooker
3. Rice cooker
